## Rockler Electronic Speaker

  <img src="images/speaker.jpeg" 
     alt="Speaker" 
     style="float: left; width: 300px; height 300px; margin: 0 20px 20px 0; 
            border-radius: 15px; border: 3px solid #000000;">
